name: LoMRF

    Logical Markov Random Fields.
# LoMRF: Logical Markov Random Fields LoMRF is an open-source implementation of [Markov Logic Networks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markov_logic_network) (MLNs) written in [Scala programming language](http://scala-lang.org). Latest stable version [LoMRF v0.5.1](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/releases). ## Features overview: 1. Parallel grounding algorithm based on [Akka Actors library](http://akka.io). 2. Marginal (MC-SAT) and MAP (MaxWalkSAT and LP-relaxed Integer Linear Programming) inference (**lomrf infer**). 3. Batch and on-line Weight Learning (Max-Margin, AdaGrad and CDA) (**lomrf wlearn**). 4. On-line Structure Learning (OSL and OSLa) (**lomrf slearn**). 5. MLN knowledge base compilation (**lomrf compile**): * Predicate completion. * Clausal form transformation. * Replacement of functions with utility predicates and vice versa. * Reads and produces [Alchemy](http://alchemy.cs.washington.edu/alchemy1.html) compatible MLN files. 6. Can export ground MRF in various formats (**lomrf export**). 7. Can compare MLN theories (**lomrf diff**). ## License LoMRF comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions; See the [GNU Lesser General Public License v3 for more details](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html). ## Reference in Scientific Publications Please use the following BibTex entry when you cite LoMRF in your papers: ``` @misc{LoMRF, author = {Anastasios Skarlatidis}, title = {{Logical Markov Random Fields (LoMRF): an open-source implementation of Markov Logic Networks}}, url = {https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF} } ``` ## Building See [Build and Link LoMRF](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/6_1_build_and_link_lomrf.md). ## Documentation - [Quick-start guide](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/0_quick_start.md) - [Syntax](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/1_syntax.md) - [Knowledge base](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/1_1_knowledge_base.md) - [Evidence](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/1_2_evidence.md) - [Inference](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/2_inference.md) - [Probabilistic Inference Examples](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/2_1_inference_examples.md) - [Temporal Probabilistic Inference Examples](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/2_2_temporal_inference_examples.md) - [Weight Learning](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/3_weight_learning.md) - [Weight Learning Examples](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/3_1_weight_learning_examples.md) - [Temporal Weight Learning Examples](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/3_2_temporal_weight_learning_examples.md) - [Structure Learning](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/4_structure_learning.md) - [Structure Learning Examples](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/4_1_structure_learning_examples.md) - [CLI Tools](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/5_tools.md) - [Build from source](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/6_build_test_lomrf.md) - [Build and Link](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/6_1_build_and_link_lomrf.md) - [Download example data](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/6_2_download_example_data.md) - [Configuration](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/7_configuration.md) - [References](https://github.com/anskarl/LoMRF/tree/master/doc/8_references.md)
